title: Your Account is in the process of transferring

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Hi All,

I was wondering if anyone encountered the same problem. I haven't been playing League of Legends for months, my last game was in July 2016. Two days ago I decided to re-download the game and start playing again but for some reason I'm unable to log into my account and it's very weird. 

In a nutshell, my level 30 account is gone with all the progress and skins. I'm actually unable to log-in with my credentials onto EU WEST server where my account SHOULD be. Instead, my credentials work with the EU NE server where I was able to log-in and had to give myself a new summoner name and was awarded a level 5 account - not April first yet guys, cmon ( **:)** ). Changing my email/password etc. did not help. 

I've attached a screen with error I get when trying to log in EU WEST.

@RIOTers
I have logged a ticket 2 days ago and still no response. Since I reside in Ireland, I understand that Head Office is closed in Dublin over the weekend but surely you guys have an international support team that looks into these tickets? 

Best Regards,

Moostauche

replies.body: Our support agents answer tickets on a first-come-first-served basis. I took a look at your account and it seems you've already received a reply today. If you run into issues with waiting an unreasonable amount of time for a reply, let me know.
Im having the exact same issue
i'm having the same issue has it been resolved for anyone?
